name: Kodo
headline: Corporate card & spend management platform for Indian startups

## [](https://www.kodo.com/<https:/www.kodo.com/>)
Empower your teams ensuring financial discipline and compliance

# Spend Smarter with All-in-One Payment & Procurement Solutions
![](https://www.kodo.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/kodo-product-comp01a-1536x1047.webp)
Unlimited cards • Fast payouts • Reduced expenses • Simplified Procurement
Book a demo
## Companies that trust us
## Kodo Solutions: Powering Your Business
### Corporate Cards
#### Smart Spending, Full Control
Get instant virtual and physical cards for your team with quick KYC. Empower responsible spending with real-time controls, transaction updates / transaction categorization — designed for smarter expense management
![](https://www.kodo.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/kodo-product-comp2a.webp)
[ ](https://www.kodo.com/<https:/www.kodo.com/products/#kodo-cards>)
[ ](https://www.kodo.com/<https:/www.kodo.com/products/#kodo-pay>)
### Accounts Payable
#### Seamless Vendor Payments
Manage all vendor payments seamlessly from a single platform. Enjoy features like bulk uploads, approvals, and flexible payment options to streamline and secure your vendor transactions.
### Procure-to-Pay
#### Complete Procurement Solution
Manage the entire procurement process—from purchase requests to invoices—with total transparency. Drive cost-effective decisions and stay compliant with powerful tracking and reporting tools.
![](https://www.kodo.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/Frame-800X600-3.png)
[ ](https://www.kodo.com/<https:/www.kodo.com/products>)
## Club privileges that actually matter for your business
![](https://www.kodo.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/aws.webp)
### Amazon Web Services
Credits worth $5,000 over 2 years & credits worth $5,000 for business support over 1 year. 
![](https://www.kodo.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/zoho-1-300x300.webp)
### ZOHO Office Suite
$100 in Zoho Wallet credits + 10% cashback after 90 days 
![](https://www.kodo.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/freshworks.webp)
### Freshworks
Credits worth $4000. 
![](https://www.kodo.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/twilio.webp)
### Twilio
Twilio (SMS, Voice, WhatsApp) - US$500 in credits. Twilio SendGrid (Email API + marketing campaigns) - US$1,000 in credits.
![](https://www.kodo.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/segment.webp)
### Segment
Up to $50,000 in segment credits and $1M in free software 
![](https://www.kodo.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/exotel.webp)
### Exotel
50% more credits in all standard plans. 
## Our Partners
![](https://www.kodo.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/rbl-min.webp)
![](https://www.kodo.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/sbm-min.webp)
![](https://www.kodo.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/exprian.webp)
## We are backed by​
![](https://www.kodo.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/brex.webp)
![](https://www.kodo.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/combinator-logo.png)
![](https://www.kodo.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/goat-capital.webp)
![](https://www.kodo.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/pioneer-fund-1.webp)
## The numbers so far
![](https://www.kodo.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/icons8-business-building-50.svg)
### 1500+
Over 1500+ customers
![](https://www.kodo.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/icons8-money-box-50.svg)
### 50 lakhs
Over 50 Lakhs in customer savings
![](https://www.kodo.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/icons8-delivery-time-50.svg)
### 1 Hour
Average query response time
## What our customers are saying
"We were exploring solutions where we could manage our corporate expenses with the help of a dedicated service team to assist us at every step. And that's when we came across Kodo. The team has been really helpful and has provided us with solutions like the single dashboard feature, real-time statement availability and flexibility in changing the spend limits as and when required to manage our expenses seamlessly and more efficiently. I would definitely recommend their services to everyone who is looking to avail of the best solution for simplifying their corporate expenses." 
![Groww](https://www.kodo.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/grow-testimonials.webp)
GrowwPratik Lakhotia, Associate Director, Finance
“Excellent customer service and the team responds in a timely manner. We have developed a great partnership with Kodo and their dedication toward resolving queries each time we raise them is evident in all aspects so far. I have been able to close some of the gaps that the team at large was facing. Kodo team’s approach somehow works for us and for the first time, I am genuinely excited about writing this testimonial” 
![Fireside Ventures](https://www.kodo.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/fireside-ventures.webp)
Fireside VenturesRicha Gupta, Office Manager
"Kodo Card have made it extremely easy for us to manage all our office expenses and process reimbursement claims. Earlier we were using our personal credit cards for company expenses but now with Kodo, we are avoiding mistakes and keeping our accounting books clean. I like that we can set controls on each of our cards - change credit limit, enable/disable cards, etc. - directly from our Kodo dashboard. 100% recommend." 
![Fashinza](https://www.kodo.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/fashinza.webp)
FashinzaPawan Gupta, CEO and Co-founder
"We’ve been with Kodo since 2021 and we love the experience so far. Kodo cards have been issued to most of our employees and it’s been a seamless process. We are very impressed that their customer service exceeds expectations every time. A dedicated point-of-contact helps us with the swift resolution of our queries, whether it’s during the day or at night. The Kodo team also works very closely with us to create custom solutions that solve our most pressing payment pain-points. I’d definitely recommend Kodo to any large company that’s looking to streamline and simplify its corporate payment process." 
![Mensa](https://www.kodo.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/mensa-testimonials.webp)
MensaFinance Manager
"The greatest sense of fulfilment in life comes when your stakeholders realise the potential of what you are building! It has been a delight partnering with Kodo Card in providing us the liquidity and convenience to serve the billion consumers of Bharat and provide them the experience they aspire to, and more importantly, they deserve." 
![1K Kirana Bazaar](https://www.kodo.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/1k-kirana.webp)
1K Kirana BazaarAbhishek Halder, Founder
"Like every startup out there, we were limited by the services offered to us by traditional banks. It was then that we found Kodo. We were delighted with their product and how seamless it was to be onboarded. What we admire most about Kodo is how quickly they act on a given problem and go above and beyond to provide us with a resolution. I would recommend Kodo to anyone who needs help with a platform to help you simplify your corporate expenses and provide you with a rewarding user experience." 
![mCaffeine](https://www.kodo.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/mcaff.webp)
mCaffeineAmey Shetty, Finance Manager
## Save time & money. Get started in under 3 minutes
Use your virtual card or top up your virtual account to start making payments instantly

Simplifying corporate banking andfinance

generated_description:
Kodo is an innovative fintech company based in India, founded in 2019 and part of Y Combinator Batch W21. With a mission to streamline financial management for Indian startups, Kodo provides a corporate card and spend management platform designed to foster financial discipline and compliance.

Imagine a company where managing expenses doesn't feel like navigating a labyrinth—Kodo offers just that. Their platform facilitates everything from issuing virtual and physical corporate cards, to simplifying vendor payments and procurement processes. With tools that elevate control, such as real-time transaction updates and customizable spending limits, Kodo lets businesses focus on what they do best. 

Kodo's team consists of 45 dedicated employees and is led by Group Partner Jared Friedman. Since its inception, Kodo has gained traction quickly, serving over 1,500 customers and achieving impressive savings for businesses. The average query response time is a brisk hour, reflecting their commitment to customer support.

Their offerings are designed to empower teams, allowing for simplified expense tracking and management across various aspects of a business. They boast numerous integrations—including partnerships with major players like Amazon Web Services and Freshworks—providing users significant credits and benefits along the way.

For startups navigating the complexities of finance, Kodo's approach represents a refreshing departure from the cumbersome services of traditional banks. They are on a mission to not just simplify corporate accounts, but to redefine what effective financial management looks like for startups aiming for success.

To explore their solutions, visit [Kodo's website](https://www.kodo.com). Whether you're looking for robust spend management tools or a straightforward corporate card system, Kodo stands ready to help you spend smarter and achieve more.
